name: Tutorial_T3
_source: speak;Anna;Hey, didja hear the good news?|In FE8R, weapons don't have durability!|So you can use 'em as much as you like!|However, there are weapons that have <red>Cooldowns!</>|You don't have any yet, but take the humble Javelin.|Once it's used, it will go on cooldown for 2 turns.|You can tell how long a cooldown is in the unit's item menu.|Let's keep going with the Javelin example.|When you check it after using it, it'd say 0/2.|The number on the left indicates how many turns have passed...|And the number on the right means when you can use it again.|So, if it said 1/2, you'd have 1 more turn left!|Then you could use it again!|A lot of ranged weapons, Killer weapons, or Brave weapons have cooldowns.|So keep an eye out! And always bring a spare!;;;;6
